TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICTPFactory

summary.span: Utilizado para crear un panel de tareas personalizado.

span.span: Used to create a custom task pane.

span.para: Nota: puede crear paneles de tareas personalizados en cualquier lenguaje que admita COM y permita crear archivos de biblioteca de vínculos dinámicos (DLL). Por ejemplo, Microsoft Visual Basic® 6.0, Microsoft Visual Basic. NET, Microsoft Visual C++®, Microsoft Visual C++ .NET y Microsoft Visual C#®. Sin embargo, Microsoft Visual Basic para aplicaciones (VBA) no admite la creación de paneles de tareas personalizados.

Note: You can create custom task panes in any language that supports COM and allows you to create dynamic-linked library (DLL) files. For example, Microsoft Visual Basic® 6.0, Microsoft Visual Basic .NET, Microsoft Visual C++®, Microsoft Visual C++ .NET, and Microsoft Visual C#®. However, Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) does not support creating custom task panes.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomTaskPane CreateCTP (string CTPAxID, string CTPTitle, object CTPParentWindow);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomTaskPane CreateCTP([in]string CTPAxID, [in]string CTPTitle, [in]object CTPParentWindow) runtime managed
Public Function CreateCTP (CTPAxID As String, CTPTitle As String, Optional CTPParentWindow As Object) As CustomTaskPane

param.name: CTPAxID
param.span: CLSID o ProgID de un objeto de Microsoft ActiveX®.

span.span: The CLSID or ProgID of a Microsoft ActiveX® object.
The title for the task pane.

param.name: CTPParentWindow
param.span: Ventana que hospeda el panel de tareas.

span.span: The window that hosts the task pane.

param.span: Si no está presente, el elemento principal del panel de tareas es la propiedad ActiveWindow de la aplicación host.

span.span: If not present, the parent of the task pane is the ActiveWindow property of the host application.

summary.span: Crea una instancia de un panel de tareas personalizado.

span.span: Creates an instance of a custom task pane.
